EE 6900 - Neuromorphic Computing
Professor Fang is extremely knowledgeable on this subject matter and his work in the field is impressive. Highly recommend. Prepare for paper reviews and research into the subject but he makes it easy to get a good grade if you show effort
Course can be done completely online. Labs are solo and all tests are online open notes no lockdown browser. Extremely easy course if you have any semblance of experience in embedded linux and C.

If you have the option to take him for any class, you DEFINITELY should. He knows the subject super well and makes learning the topics super easy. He records his lectures and lets you know what topics will be on the exams. He also gives good feedback on labs and explains exactly where you went wrong. Great professor.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Easy class & grader. The lectures were interesting. 7 one-page assignments are responding to articles & a final presentation. My only disappointment was it wasn't until the very end of the class that he gave me a B when I should've gotten an A.
